extension

x-twitter - Used to hold a reference to the API provider’s Twitter account.

The x-twitter extension is used to hold a reference to the API provider’s Twitter account. It can appear as a property in the following objects: ["contactObject"].

Schema

{"type"=>"string"}

Example

openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: My API
  version: 1.0.0
  contact:
    x-twitter: APIs-guru

Used by: (informational)

  • APIs.guru
